name: 大头侏罗纪
description:
《大头侏罗纪》 is a nurturant game based on dinosaurs.
You can collect dinosaur eggs in the dungeons, expand your army, and then use equipment to improve their abilities, defeating the bosses at each location.
teams and replicas:
There are 10 replicas, properly arranged according to the attributes of the dinosaur, different bosses have different weaknesses.
[the list]
  • [/ list] gear:
    There are four levels of equipment in terms of quality, and each level has many types. Dinosaurs can only be equipped with certain types of equipment.
    Base Building Bonus:
    Extra loot can be used to upgrade the bonus, to make their dinosaurs more powerful.
    [the list]
  • [/ list] map:
    When you acquire a dinosaur, you unlock the corresponding map, which gives you an intuitive view of the range of attributes of the dinosaur.
